text.section: Six members of the Board are a quorum.
The Board shall meet at least quarterly or more often as necessary to carry out its duties efficiently.

A member:
may not receive compensation as a member of the Board; but
is entitled to reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations as provided in the State budget.
Except as provided in subsection (c) of this section, a member may not financially benefit directly or indirectly from the activities of the Fund.
The Department shall provide staff to the Board.
